objects.specification: A spacious floor surface with a smooth pale beige finish, crafted to create a warm and bright atmosphere. It features a subtle matte texture that reduces glare and adds visual depth. The uniform, lightly speckled coloration evokes a welcoming and clean classroom environment.

An interior wall panel with a pristine white seamless surface, exhibiting a smooth plaster finish that reflects light evenly. The edges are sharp and straight, forming a clean rectangular profile. The wall serves as a neutral backdrop to highlight mounted elements and decorative accents.

An interior wall panel with a pristine white seamless surface, exhibiting a smooth plaster finish that reflects light evenly. The edges are sharp and straight, forming a clean rectangular profile. The wall serves as a neutral backdrop to highlight mounted elements and decorative accents.

An interior wall panel with a pristine white seamless surface, exhibiting a smooth plaster finish that reflects light evenly. The edges are sharp and straight, forming a clean rectangular profile. The wall serves as a neutral backdrop to highlight mounted elements and decorative accents.

An interior wall panel with a pristine white seamless surface, exhibiting a smooth plaster finish that reflects light evenly. The edges are sharp and straight, forming a clean rectangular profile. The wall serves as a neutral backdrop to highlight mounted elements and decorative accents.

A simple wooden classroom door with a pale wood grain finish, featuring a flat rectangular panel design and a slight bevel detail around the edges. The surface has a subtle matte varnish that accentuates the natural wood texture. It incorporates a minimalistic metal handle in a polished silver tone.

A modern whiteboard with a bright white glossy surface framed by a slim aluminum trim. It has a clean rectangular shape and a smooth writing area suitable for dry-erase markers. The board's edges are finished with rounded corners to ensure safety and a polished look.

An educational poster with a high-resolution print featuring vibrant colors and clear educational graphics. It has a thin matte lamination to reduce reflections and protect the surface. The poster is mounted on a rigid backing, forming a flat rectangular display with sharp corners.

An educational poster with a high-resolution print featuring vibrant colors and clear educational graphics. It has a thin matte lamination to reduce reflections and protect the surface. The poster is mounted on a rigid backing, forming a flat rectangular display with sharp corners.

A circular wall clock with a sleek frame and a clean white face featuring bold black numerals and simple black hour and minute hands. The clock has a thin bezel with a metallic finish and houses a clear glass cover that protects the face. Its minimalist design ensures readability from across the room.

An educational poster with a high-resolution print featuring vibrant colors and clear educational graphics. It has a thin matte lamination to reduce reflections and protect the surface. The poster is mounted on a rigid backing, forming a flat rectangular display with sharp corners.

An educational poster with a high-resolution print featuring vibrant colors and clear educational graphics. It has a thin matte lamination to reduce reflections and protect the surface. The poster is mounted on a rigid backing, forming a flat rectangular display with sharp corners.

A classic classroom window composed of a white-painted frame and clear glass panes. The glass has a subtle light blue tint, allowing natural light to diffuse softly into the room. The rectangular window features crisp edges and a slender frame profile.

A soft fabric curtain with a light neutral tone, exhibiting gentle folds and a semi-opaque weave. The curtain is suspended from a concealed track and drapes gracefully to cover the window opening. The fabric has a subtle texture that adds warmth without obstructing too much light.

A classic classroom window composed of a white-painted frame and clear glass panes. The glass has a subtle light blue tint, allowing natural light to diffuse softly into the room. The rectangular window features crisp edges and a slender frame profile.

A soft fabric curtain with a light neutral tone, exhibiting gentle folds and a semi-opaque weave. The curtain is suspended from a concealed track and drapes gracefully to cover the window opening. The fabric has a subtle texture that adds warmth without obstructing too much light.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a light natural wood finish and multiple evenly spaced shelves. The bookshelf features clean straight lines, a flat top, and a sturdy back panel. It is populated with a variety of books and educational materials, showcasing colorful spines and neat arrangements.

A large teacher's desk with a rich walnut wood tone finish and a pronounced wood grain pattern. The desk top has a smooth semi-gloss varnish and substantial thickness. It features sturdy square legs and a modesty panel, creating a professional and durable workspace.

A student chair with a sturdy wooden frame in a medium wood tone and a softly curved backrest. The seat is upholstered in a soft blue fabric with a matte finish for comfortable seating. The chair rests on four straight legs with protective foot caps and includes supportive crossbars.

A medium-sized student desk with a light maple wood tone finish and a subtle wood grain texture. The desk surface has a smooth matte coating and gently rounded corners. Supported by slim metal legs painted in a neutral color, the design is functional and unobtrusive.

A slim rectangular ceiling-mounted LED panel with a white matte housing and a frosted diffuser. The panel emits uniform bright white light and has a minimalistic profile. It is designed to integrate seamlessly into the ceiling with clean edges.

A potted plant with a ceramic planter in a neutral off-white tone and a smooth matte surface. The plant features lush green foliage with multiple organic leaf shapes and a healthy, vibrant appearance. The arrangement adds a natural touch to the indoor space.

A compact waste bin made of durable plastic in a neutral gray color with a matte finish. It has a simple cylindrical profile with a slightly tapered base and smooth rounded rim. The bin's clean design makes it unobtrusive and functional in a classroom setting.
